task.title: Video Capture
task.shortdesc: These source types are generally used to add webcams and capture cards. The webcam capture is optional.

taskbody.context:
This section covers the steps to add webcams in screen recordings.
Refer to the link for full list of settings for video capture. https://obsproject.com/kb/video-capture-sources

step.cmd: Click the ‘+’ icon in the Sources tab.
Select Video Capture from the drop-down list.
Select a Device from the available options.
Click Activate to capture a video during a screen recording.

step.stepresult: An integrated video capturing device is configured.
